Title: Kalifornia
Writer: Stephen Levy (story), Tim Metcalfe (story), Tim Metcalfe (screenplay)
Actors: Brad Pitt, Kathy Larson, David Milford, David Duchovny
Plot: A journalist duo go on a tour of serial killer murder sites with two companions, unaware that one of them is a serial killer himself.
Production: PolyGram Filmed Entertainment, Propaganda Films, Viacom Productions
